Summary: Steady flashing pattern of lights in the sky near Seymour Texas
divs: sighting detailsa friend and i had been hunting near seymour tx. as we were leaving, an hour or so after dark, he noticed a flashing (blinking) light in the sky. we were approximately 20 miles west of seymour and the lights were slightly south and west of us. the lights had a steady, repeating pattern of about 1\2 second on then 1\2 second off. this pattern repeated for as long as we watched the lights. the lights were at a very high altitude, and was a pattern or grid of lights. it looked like a bank of lights from a football stadium. we watched for several minutes and the lights did not move. i am ex-air force and work in the aircraft industry and have never seen anything so large at such a high altitude. i was able to take a video of the lights with my digital camera. the first attachment was at no zoom, the second at 12x zoom. the lights were still there when we left the area.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Seymour
This sighting has never been favorited.
